verses.content: “LALPA in Pathienin in va hluo ding rama a ṭhuoi lût cheu a, in hmaa hnam tamtak, Hit mihai, Girgas mihai, Amor mihai, Kanaan mihai, Periz mihai, Hiv mihai, Jebus mihai dâm, nangni nêka ropui le thilthawthei hnam sarihai a hnawt suok pha,
in sukbohmang vawng ding a nih; anni le chun thu in thlung ding a ni nawh a, in lunginsiet ding khawm a ni nawh.
Nuhmei pasalah in nei ding a ni bawk nawh, in naunuhmeihai chu an naupasalhai leh in inneitir ding a ni bawk nawh.
In nau a mi zui laihai hi Pathien danghai biekna tieng ṭhuoi kawi el an ta; chun, LALPA lung khawm chu in chungah hung inthawk a ta, suk- bohmang vak el a ti cheu.
An chungah hieng ang hin in thaw lem ding a nih, an mâichâmhai sukchim in ta, an lungphunhai suknâwi in ta, an Aserahai phûr in ta, an milim siemfâwmhai in raw vawng ding a nih.
LALPA in Pathien ta dingin hnam inthieng in ni sih a, leilunga hnam po poa inthawk ama chanpuol bîk ni dinga LALPA in Pathienin a thlang cheu a nih.
“Hnam dang nêka in tam leiin LALPAIN in chungah a hmangaina ân fûktir a, a thlang cheu a ni nawh a; hnam po poa hnam tlâwm tak in nih in sawnnaw.
LALPAIN a hmangai cheu lei le, in pi le puhai kuoma ṭawng a lo inkhâm chu hlen a nuom leiin a nih, LALPAIN Aiguptaa lal Pharao kuta inthawka kut hrâttakin suoka in- thawka a sansuok cheu chu.
Chuleiin, LALPA in Pathien chu Pathien a nih ti hre ro; Pathien ringum, ama hmangaia a thu zâwmtu chunga suon sâng chena thuthlung le lunginsietna innghat zing a,
ama theidatuhai sukbohmang dinga anni chung ngeia thung hlak a nih; ama theidatuhai chu riel sâwt naw ni a; anni chunga ngei thung a tih.
Chuleiin, thupêk dâm, thuruot dâm, rorêl dâm, zâwm dinga vawi- sûna thu ka pêk cheu hi in zâwm ding a nih.
“Hieng rorêlhai hi in ngai a, in zâwm a, in thaw leiin LALPA in Pathienin in pi le puhai kuoma ṭawng a lo inkhâm thuthlung le lunginsiet- na chu in chungah innghat a ta;

hmangai a ti cheu a, malsâwm a ti cheu a, sukpung a ti cheu a, pêk dinga in pi le puhai kuoma ân khâmna rama chun in rila ra le in hnuoi ra khawm malsâwm bawk a tih, in bu dâm, in uoin dâm, in hriek dâm, in bâwngtehai le in berâmtehai khawm.
Hnam po po laia chun malsâwm ni bîk in ta, nangni lai a nuhmei a pasalin a ching hrim hrim um naw ni hai, in ran laia khawm.
Chun, LALPA chun hri po po sukkiengpêk vawng a ti cheu a, in hriet ta hnung Aigupta ram hrihai chu in chungah inlêngtir naw nih a, a theidatuhai po po chungah inlêngtir lem a tih.

LALPA in Pathienin a pêk ding cheu hnamhai po po chu in sukbo- hmang vawng ding a nih, in lungin- siet ding a ni nawh a, an Pathien rawng khawm in bâwl ding a ni nawh; in ta dingin châng a ni el ding a ni sih a.
“In lungrilah ‘Hieng hnamhai hi ei ni nêkin an tam sih a, ieng tin am hnawt suok thei ei ta?’ ti in ni chun anni chu ṭi naw ro.
LALPA in Pathienin Pharao le Aigupta mi po po chunga thil a thawhai kha hre zing ro,

fiena nasatakin in mit ngeia in hmuhai, inchikna dâm, thilmak dâm, kut hrâttak dâm, bân phar dâma LALPA in Pathienin a ṭhuoi suokna cheu kha; khâng ang khan LALPA in Pathienin in mi ṭihai chunga chun thaw pei a tih.
LALPA in Pathien chun anni lai chun khuoingal tir nâwk nghâl a ta; a la dam, nangnia inthawka inbi- hmanghai chu an bohmang vawng chenin.
Anni chu in ṭi ding a ni nawh; LALPA in Pathien chu nangni lai a um sih a, Pathien ropuitak, ṭiumtak el chu.

LALPA in Pathien chun chuong hnamhai chu damte tein hnawt suokpêk hret hret a ti cheu a; a suk- bohmang vawng el nghâl ding a ni nawh, chuong naw chun ramsahai in pawi tâwk khawpin hung pung rawi an tih.
An bohmang hma khat chu LALPA in Pathienin anni pêng a ti cheu a, buoi namênin anni sukbuoi naw nih.
An lalhai chu in kutah pêng a ta, an hming chu vânkhuphnuoia inthawk hin in thaihmang dai ding a nih; in sukbohmang dêr chenin in hmaa ngîr thei tukhawm um hrim hrim naw ni hai.

An Pathien lim siem fâwmhai chu in raw ding a nih, chutaka tangkaruo amanih, rângkachak ama- nih chu in inhnar ding a ni nawh a; in ta dingin in lâk ding a ni bawk nawh, chuong naw chun âwk el rawi in tih; LALPA in Pathien ngaiin thil tirdakum an ni sih a.
In in sûngah thil tirdakum la lûtin chu thil ang chun ṭawngse- phurah in insiem ding a ni nawh; tirdakum namên loa tirdakin in theida hle ding a nih, ṭawngsephur thil a ni sih a.
